title: Designing Organizational Learning Processes Based on Scientific Modeling and Utilizing IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level specialized knowledge, problem-solving skills, and basic understanding of scientific inquiry methodologies
context.additional_context: Organizational learning simulation through multi-role activities. Applies experimental design and data analysis methods in VR-based collaborative learning across diverse scenarios

learning_goals: Create a multi-role activity model based on scientific inquiry procedures using IMS Learning Design (LD) standard elements
Visualize organizational learning processes using system dynamics modeling techniques and simulate them in experimental environments
Cultivate the ability to optimize learning design models according to actual organizational variables through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
